home.title: FindMyUsers
home.subtitle: Open Source Dynamic Website CMS Without Database
home.description: FindMyUsers is a dynamic, database-free website built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/UI, featuring a content management system powered by the GitHub API for seamless updates and administration.
